extendedInfo.description: Use This Journal to write journals and diaries wherever you go whenever you want. Add photos, audio or video files to your journals. Create tasks, one time or recurring and get notified. Search for journals and protect access to your journalsby enabling password. Auto backup your database to SD card.Main Features- Write and view journals.- Create, schedule and view tasks.- Task notifications.- Calendar view.- Set first day of week in calendar views.- Search for journals and tasks.- Add media files on external SD card.- Take photo, audio, video and save.- Auto/Manual Backup and Restore.- Export journals.- Email journals.- Finger paint notes.- Password protection.- Speech to text.- Labels on journals and tasks.- UI adjusted for tablets.- Auto Save.

reviews.title: Photo crash
reviews.comment: I love this app but it crashes every time I look at a photo in a past entry.   To keep it from crashing, I have to edit the entry that has the photos I want to look at.  PLEASE fix this bug.  Galaxy S II  \302\240(o^^)o
reviews.author: Dennis Shoemaker

reviews.title: Does what I want.
reviews.comment: Once you decide how it works best for your needs, you will never want to be without it. Perfect for daily farming records.
reviews.author: Mitch Conner

reviews.title: Military time figured out.
reviews.comment: I do not care what other people think about this app. I just have to say that I love it and since I only use it for my new job on my schedule and how the day went, it has been so very helpful. I can even click a button to go find my memos instead of going day by day.
reviews.author: Kevin Davison

reviews.title: Cant notify me
reviews.comment: Uninstalled
reviews.author: susan xiong

reviews.title: Its a great app...
reviews.comment: Perfect for recording family days out. When will you bring out a version for Tablets.?
reviews.author: Tony Cavanagh

reviews.title: Simple, clean app
reviews.comment: I enjoy using this app.  There is a shortcut bar down the bottom which didn\'t display in the free version and I find this very useful.
reviews.author: Gavin H

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
reviews.comment: I\'m so in love with this app. I\'ve always wanted a journal on my phone. Now I have the best one. Yea! Love it. I really recommend this to those that want a journal app. This one is perfect. I\'ve tried 4 other journal apps and none where as good as this journal. If I want I can do an audio or video diary, which is one of the best features. You guys should try it if u want a cool journal app.  Good job devs.
reviews.author: Montesha Jones

reviews.title: New phone
reviews.comment: I got a new phone and was able to print all my entries and save on my computer.  I was unable to restore the entries on my new phone though.  It doesn\'t have an sd   card though.  Maybe that\'s why.  I rely want to view all my entries on the app though.  Please give more directions on how to do this.  Why doesn\'t import restore those files?  Love the app other than that!
reviews.author: Heidi Buffington

reviews.title: Options for task notification uncheckable
reviews.comment: In new task or reschedule,  the options for notification are visible but cannot be. Checked/selected.
reviews.author: Michael Donnelly

reviews.comment: Love it! Great stress relief...
reviews.author: CarrieAnn Riddick

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.comment: I like the way it\'s set up \'cept for: You can\'t share things into app via system share.  The images are displayed WAY too small.  Hyperlinks need to be enabled in text fields.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bought it
reviews.comment: now i have tablet, cuz if eyes getting old  Thought of makingmit easier for my sekf in old age , but sadly i cant use it on my samsung tablet. I realy need it so i dont firget things Would be nuce uf u update for tablets
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Have used since Day 1:
reviews.comment: Obviously I like the app.  But....still....so wish images were displayed in their original size in each note.  They \'say\' more than the text and should be displayed prominently in the note AND as thumbnails.
reviews.author: Tim Morrison

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is just what I want. Task and journal in one. I will give 5 stars when I can actually use it as a calendar too. I want to be able to put in events, holidays, and birthdays.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Application
reviews.comment: Recommend to any one who needs a very good diary application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the app
reviews.comment: Love the app can\'t figure out how to get entries from phone to computet to print.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good application. Its what i have been looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just verified that if you lose your first phone and get a new 1 you can retrieve all of your records I couldn\'t do that with my last journal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good improvement on new upgrade
reviews.comment: On point with all features
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Thank you! Exactly what Ive been looking for especially the password protected!!!
